{{cpp/regex/match_results/title|str}}
{{cpp/regex/match_results/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++11|1=
string_type str( size_type n = 0 ) const;
}}

Returns a string representing the indicated sub-match.

If {{c|1=n == 0}}, a string representing entire matched expression is returned.

If {{c|0 &lt; n &amp;&amp; n &lt; size()}}, a string representing {{c|n}}{{sup|th}} sub-match is returned.

if {{c|1=n &gt;= size()}}, a string representing the unmatched match is returned.

The call is equivalent to {{c|string_type((*this)[n])}};

{{cpp/precondition|{{rlpf|ready}} must be {{c|true}}.}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|n|integral number specifying which match to return}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
Returns a string representing the specified match or sub match.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;regex&gt;
#include &lt;string&gt;
 
int main()
{
    std::string target("baaaby");
    std::smatch sm;
 
    std::regex re1("a(a)*b");
    std::regex_search(target, sm, re1);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "entire match: " &lt;&lt; sm.str(0) &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; "submatch #1: " &lt;&lt; sm.str(1) &lt;&lt; '\n';

    std::regex re2("a(a*)b");
    std::regex_search(target, sm, re2);
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "entire match: " &lt;&lt; sm.str(0) &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; "submatch #1: " &lt;&lt; sm.str(1) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
entire match: aaab
submatch #1: a
entire match: aaab
submatch #1: aa
}}
